title: Crypto 2026 Predictions - On-Chain Shift & Tokenization
summary: Predictions for the cryptocurrency landscape in 2026, suggesting it could mark the beginning of a significant shift in financial markets through on-chain asset migration and tokenization.

key_insights.insight: 2026 will start a 5-year period where assets increasingly move on-chain
2026 will be defined by tokenization of financial products, starting with most liquid products
Regulation for digital titles and NFTs representing value expected late 2026 or 2027, derivatives may come later

relevance_to_strategy.tier_5_crypto: HIGH - Direct crypto market predictions for 2026
relevance_to_strategy.tier_1_etfs: MEDIUM - Tokenization may affect traditional ETF landscape
relevance_to_strategy.tier_2_growth: LOW - Indirect impact on growth stocks
